frontmatter.title: Front-end Developer
frontmatter.subtitle: Hi , my name is Darlington.
frontmatter.content: I'm a web designer specializing in front-end.👨🏽‍💻 I'm also a proficient pizza cook and a self-proclaimed green thumb. 🍕🌱 For the past 5 years, I've worked for AFIC, creating sites for startups and small businesses to help them grow and achieve their dreams.
